definition: a metal frame or container holding cartridges
details:
noun
- a metal frame or container holding cartridges
= synonyms: clip
- a storehouse (as a compartment on a warship) where weapons and ammunition are stored
= synonyms: powder store
- product consisting of a paperback periodic publication as a physical object
= example: product consisting of a paperback periodic publication as a physical object
- a light-tight supply chamber holding the film and supplying it for exposure as required
= synonyms: cartridge
- a periodic publication containing pictures and stories and articles of interest to those who purchase it or subscribe to it
= example: a periodic publication containing pictures and stories and articles of interest to those who purchase it or subscribe to it
= synonyms: mag
- a business firm that publishes magazines
= example: a business firm that publishes magazines
= synonyms: magazine publisher
